➡️ @CaleRammel1 @clpelite @ChrisMcLavishjr @AttackIndiana @FPbasketball https://t.co/CAtpchXBgX

Mason Bales (Northridge) with a big fastbreak dunk (seems to be his first in-game dunk though that is not confirmed) as Indiana Attack 2025 is cruising over the Michigan Avengers.  #PHHavocInTheHeartland
Indiana Attack 2025 leading 38-18 at the break. Mason Bales and Reece Stewart lead the way with 8. Collin Czarnecki with 7. #PHHavocInTheHeartland
Final game of the weekend for me before heading back to school, Indiana Attack 2025 vs Michigan Avengers 2025. Reece Stewart (Penn) starts the game with a pair of triples. #PHHavocInTheHeartland

Mason Bales is a bucket for @AttackIndiana Lefty scored inside and out. Moves well without the ball. Finished through contact. Good handle. Off to a good start against @wmlakersbball 2025 Gold. #PHHavocInTheHeartland
